definition: remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: We give them a sense of humor because laughter leaven life.
sentences.chinese: 我們要給予他們幽默感，因爲笑聲可以使生活更輕鬆。

sentences.english: First-class teachers have a good sense of humor.
He has a good clean sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 他有着高雅而不低俗的幽默感。

sentences.english: Think you know your work setting well enough to tread on this dangerous ground?
sentences.chinese: 你以爲你的幽默感好得可以無所忌憚？

sentences.english: Jap training methods are both humorless and tireless.
sentences.chinese: 日本人的訓練方法即缺乏幽默感又不知疲倦。

sentences.english: Everybody admires him for his fine sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 人人羨慕他那極好的幽默感。

sentences.english: I have to give the reviewer credit as he has had a great sense of humor about the whole incident.
sentences.chinese: 這位書評人對此所表現的幽默感，實在令我非常欣賞。

sentences.english: Jeremy is remembered for his great sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 人們不會忘記傑里米那絕妙的幽默感。

sentences.english: Putin himself is sardonic but humorless.
Try to keep your sense of humor and let it triumph over grumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 保持幽默感並讓它勝過乖戾的性情。

sentences.english: People also enjoy Garfield's outrageous6 sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 人們同時也喜歡加菲貓語不驚人死不休的幽默感。

sentences.english: It’s a film full of affection and humor.
sentences.chinese: 這可謂是一部充滿了溫情和幽默感的電影。

sentences.english: I admire his sense of humor.
He's terrific. He has a sense of humor, and is considerate.
sentences.chinese: 他好棒，富有幽默感又體貼人。

sentences.english: The ability to show a sense of humor at off-the-cuff and casual conversations is also incredibly important.
sentences.chinese: 在即席和非正式談話中顯示幽默感也非常重要。

sentences.english: It looked like clouds and a sense of humor didn't mix.
sentences.chinese: 這裏看上去烏雲密佈，和幽默感格格不入。

definition: emotional quotient (EQ)/emotional IQ/abbr. for 情緒商數|情绪商数[qing2 xu4 shang1 shu4]
to amuse/to make sb laugh/to tease
(personal) warmth/approachability/accessibility/(in a product) user friendliness/(chemistry) affinity
